data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jo, Yeong-Seok, Baccus, John T., Koprowski, John L. (2018): Mammals of Korea: a review of their taxonomy, distribution and conservation status. Zootaxa 4522 (1): 1-216, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4522.1.1|101 occurrences
